pages.title: Logistics and You
pages.text: This knowledge is acquired by trading with us through the $(item)Amadron tablet$().$(br2)By trading us $(item)Charged Certus Quartz$() you will have demonstrated the completion of the $(l:sim_3/4_resources)4th$() task in this simulation.
This knowledge is required before you can make a $(item)ME Controller$() and start expanding your ME network.
